verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for your <S%H7453>friend,<s%> if you have <S%H8628>stricken<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> with a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%>
You are <S%H3369>snared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> you are <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H645>now,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> yourself, <S%H3588>when<s%> you are <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H7453>friend;<s%> <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H7511>humble<s%> yourself, and make <S%H7292>sure<s%> your <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> not <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> nor <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to your <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> yourself as a <S%H6643>roe<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6718>hunter,<s%> and as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler.<s%>
<S%H3212>Go<s%> to the <S%H5244>ant,<s%> you <S%H6102>sluggard;<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> her <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise:<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> having <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7101>guide,<s%> <S%H7860>overseer,<s%> or <S%H4910>ruler,<s%>
<S%H3559>Provides<s%> her <S%H3899>meat<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer,<s%> and <S%H103>gathers<s%> her <S%H3978>food<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7901>sleep,<s%> O <S%H6102>sluggard?<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> will you <S%H6965>arise<s%> out of your <S%H8142>sleep?<s%>
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep:<s%>
So shall your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as one that <S%H1980>travels,<s%> and your <S%H4270>want<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
A <S%H1100>naughty<s%> <S%H120>person,<s%> a <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> with a <S%H6143>fraudulent<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H7169>winks<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> he <S%H4448>speaks<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> he <S%H3384>teaches<s%> with his <S%H676>fingers;<s%>
<S%H8419>Frowardness<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> he <S%H2790>devises<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> <S%H6256>continually;<s%> he <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4066>discord.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall his <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly;<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> shall he be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4832>remedy.<s%>
<S%H2007>These<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> things does the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8130>hate:<s%> yes, <S%H7651>seven<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to him:
A <S%H7311>proud<s%> <S%H5869>look,<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> and <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%>
An <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H2790>devises<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>imaginations,<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> that be <S%H4116>swift<s%> in <S%H7323>running<s%> to <S%H7451>mischief,<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> that <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3576>lies,<s%> and he that <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4090>discord<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H517>mother:<s%>
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H6029>tie<s%> them <S%H5921>about<s%> your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
When you <S%H1980>go,<s%> it shall <S%H5148>lead<s%> you; when you <S%H7901>sleep,<s%> it shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> you; and when you <S%H6974>wake,<s%> it shall <S%H7878>talk<s%> with you.

For the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp;<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H216>light;<s%> and <S%H8433>reproofs<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life:<s%>
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> from the <S%H2513>flattery<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of a <S%H5237>strange<s%> woman.
<S%H2530>Lust<s%> not after her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let her <S%H3947>take<s%> you with her <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>

For by <S%H1157>means<s%> of a <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> a man is brought to a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and the <S%H802>adulteress<s%> <S%H376><s%> will <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and his <S%H899>clothes<s%> not be <S%H8313>burned?<s%>
Can <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> on hot <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and his <S%H7272>feet<s%> not be <S%H3554>burned?<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> he that <S%H935>goes<s%> in to his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> her shall not be <S%H5352>innocent.<s%>
Men do not <S%H936>despise<s%> a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H1589>steal<s%> to <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7456>hungry;<s%>
But if he be <S%H4672>found,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold;<s%> he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But whoever <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>understanding:<s%> he that <S%H6213>does<s%> it <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
A <S%H5061>wound<s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> shall he <S%H4672>get;<s%> and his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> shall not be <S%H4229>wiped<s%> away.
For <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is the <S%H2534>rage<s%> of a <S%H1397>man:<s%> therefore he will not <S%H2550>spare<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance.<s%>

He will not <S%H5375>regard<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3724>ransom;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he rest <S%H14>content,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> you give <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts.<s%>
